ValidationRule.description: The Closed date must be blank if the status is set to Not Yet Started, In Progress or On Hold.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(OR( ISPICKVAL(pse__Status__c ,'Not Yet Started'),ISPICKVAL(pse__Status__c ,'In Progress'),ISPICKVAL(pse__Status__c ,'On Hold')), (!ISBLANK(pse__Closed_Date__c )) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: The Closed date must be blank if the status is set to Not Yet Started, In Progress or On Hold.
